Package com.sponsorpay.sdk.android

Class Summary
HostInfo Extracts device information from the host device in which the SDK runs and SponsorPay App ID contained in the Android Application Manifest of the host app.
HttpResponseParser Contains an utility method to extract the body of an HTTP response.
SignatureTools Contains convenience methods to generate digital signatures for texts and URL-encoded key-value maps.
SponsorPay This class purpose is to create, handle and manage the SPCredentials objects.
UrlBuilder Contains utility methods to build URLs used to access the SponsorPay's back-end API.
